children.value: Importing Required Libraries

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression
Loading in the dataset

life_expectancy_data = pd.read_csv("data/Life_Expectancy_at_Birth.csv")
life_expectancy_data.head()

children.value: The average life expectancy across all countries in 2021
The overall development of countries in the world

children.label: The overall development of countries in the world

children.value:
development_plot = life_expectancy_data["Human Development Groups"]
dev_count = [0, 0, 0, 0]
column_e = ["Low", "Medium", "High", "Very High"]
for i in development_plot:
    try:
        dev_count[column_e.index(i)] += 1
    except ValueError:
        pass
    
    

fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize = (16,9))
plt.barh(column_e,dev_count, color = "teal")
for i in ax.patches:
    plt.text(i.get_width()+0.2, i.get_y()+0.4,str(round((i.get_width()),2)))
plt.xlabel("Human Development Groups")
plt.ylabel("Number of Countries")
plt.title("Human Development Groups of all Countries")
plt.show()
Line Graph of the Average Life Expectancy in the World from 1990-2021

children.label: Line Graph of the Average Life Expectancy in the World from 1990-2021

children.value:
l = []
for i in range(1990, 2022):
    life_country = life_expectancy_data[["Country", f"Life Expectancy at Birth ({i})"]]
    average = np.mean(life_country[f"Life Expectancy at Birth ({i})"])
    l.append(average)
plt.plot(range(1990, 2022),l)
plt.xlabel("Year")
plt.ylabel("Average Life Expectancy")
plt.title("Average Life Expectancy of the World (1990-2021)")
plt.show()

j = []
for i in range(len(l)-1):
    j.append(l[i+1]-l[i])
plt.plot(range(1990, 2021),j)
plt.xlabel("Years")
plt.ylabel("Change in Average Life Expectancy")
plt.title("Change in Average Life Expectancy of the World (1990-2021)")
plt.show()

low = []
medi = []
high = []
vhigh = []
for i in range(1990, 2022):
    life_country = life_expectancy_data.loc[life_expectancy_data["Human Development Groups"] == "Low"][["Country", f"Life Expectancy at Birth ({i})"]]
    average = np.mean(life_country[f"Life Expectancy at Birth ({i})"])
    low.append(average)
    
    life_country = life_expectancy_data.loc[life_expectancy_data["Human Development Groups"] == "Medium"][["Country", f"Life Expectancy at Birth ({i})"]]
    average = np.mean(life_country[f"Life Expectancy at Birth ({i})"])
    medi.append(average)
    
    life_country = life_expectancy_data.loc[life_expectancy_data["Human Development Groups"] == "High"][["Country", f"Life Expectancy at Birth ({i})"]]
    average = np.mean(life_country[f"Life Expectancy at Birth ({i})"])
    high.append(average)

    life_country = life_expectancy_data.loc[life_expectancy_data["Human Development Groups"] == "Very High"][["Country", f"Life Expectancy at Birth ({i})"]]
    average = np.mean(life_country[f"Life Expectancy at Birth ({i})"])
    vhigh.append(average)

plt.plot(range(1990, 2022),low)
plt.plot(range(1990, 2022),medi)
plt.plot(range(1990, 2022),high)
plt.plot(range(1990, 2022),vhigh)
plt.xlabel("Year")
plt.ylabel("Average Life Expectancy")
plt.legend(["Low", "Medium", "High", "Very High"])
plt.title("Average Life Expectancy of the World by Human Development Index(1990-2021)")


plt.show()

model = LinearRegression()
model.fit(np.array(range(32)).reshape(-1,1),low)
reg_low=[]
for i in range(32):
    reg_low.append(i*model.coef_+model.intercept_)

change_low = model.coef_
int_low = model.intercept_
plt.plot(range(1990, 2022),low)
plt.plot(range(1990, 2022),reg_low)
plt.xlabel("Year")
plt.ylabel("Average Life Expectancy")
plt.title("Average Life Expectancy of Less Developed Countries along with Linear Regression Best Fit")

plt.show()

model = LinearRegression()
model.fit(np.array(range(32)).reshape(-1,1),medi)
reg_medi=[]
for i in range(32):
    reg_medi.append(i*model.coef_+model.intercept_)
change_medi = model.coef_
int_medi = model.intercept_
plt.plot(range(1990, 2022),medi)
plt.plot(range(1990, 2022),reg_medi)
plt.xlabel("Year")
plt.ylabel("Average Life Expectancy")
plt.title("Average Life Expectancy of Medium Developed Countries along with Linear Regression Best Fit")
plt.show()

model = LinearRegression()
model.fit(np.array(range(32)).reshape(-1,1),high)
reg_high=[]
for i in range(32):
    reg_high.append(i*model.coef_+model.intercept_)
change_high = model.coef_
int_high = model.intercept_
plt.plot(range(1990, 2022),high)
plt.plot(range(1990, 2022),reg_high)
plt.xlabel("Year")
plt.ylabel("Average Life Expectancy")
plt.title("Average Life Expectancy of Highly Developed Countries along with Linear Regression Best Fit")
plt.show()

model = LinearRegression()
model.fit(np.array(range(32)).reshape(-1,1),vhigh)
reg_vhigh=[]
for i in range(32):
    reg_vhigh.append(i*model.coef_+model.intercept_)
change_vhigh = model.coef_
int_vhigh = model.intercept_
plt.plot(range(1990, 2022),vhigh)
plt.plot(range(1990, 2022),reg_vhigh)
plt.xlabel("Year")
plt.ylabel("Average Life Expectancy")
plt.title("Average Life Expectancy of Very Highly Developed Countries along with Linear Regression Best Fit")
plt.show()

plt.plot(range(1990, 2022),reg_low)
plt.plot(range(1990, 2022),reg_medi)
plt.plot(range(1990, 2022),reg_high)
plt.plot(range(1990, 2022),reg_vhigh)

plt.xlabel("Year")
plt.ylabel("Average Life Expectancy")
plt.legend(["Low", "Medium", "High", "Very High"])
plt.title("Linear Regression for the average life expectancy by Development")
plt.show()

children.value:
print("EQUATIONS")
print(f"Low --> {change_low[0]}x + {int_low}")
print(f"Medium --> {change_medi[0]}x + {int_medi}")
print(f"High --> {change_high[0]}x + {int_high}")
print(f"Very High --> {change_vhigh[0]}x + {int_vhigh}")

plt.plot([i*change_low for i in range(32)])
plt.plot([i*change_medi for i in range(32)])
plt.plot([i*change_high for i in range(32)])
plt.plot([i*change_vhigh for i in range(32)])
plt.xlabel("Year")
plt.ylabel("Average Life Expectancy")
plt.legend(["Low", "Medium", "High", "Very High"])
plt.title("Average Increase in Life Expectancy after x Years by Development")
plt.show()
